Artist Spring in Oil Exhibition Gallery Madrid 3 - 4 Manchester Going match I like 1,200.00 $
Fast-paced match in the first leg of the Champions League semifinals. Manchester City defeated Madrid (4-3) in a fast-paced match, where the English team, leader of the English Premier and coached by Pep Guardiola, came first in this series of semifinals of the competition. However, it could have been much worse for Madrid, who were down 2-0 after 10 minutes and always reacted when City were scoring. Benzema made it 2-1, Vinicius then made it 3-2 and still Benzema, at 4-2, took a Panenka-style penalty to make it 4-3.. UEFA
Rodrigo Matus Lazo Managua, Nicaragua About me \@RafaelLopez I was born in the capital of Nicaragua, my passion has been oil painting, being my favorite oil paintings. As a child I was initiated in painting in a natural way, then I was perfecting my technique in professional schools. I have more than 10 years of experience in painting. Plastic artist Nicaragua 09:00AM Oil Painting
